LanguageData.BuildBalista_Crate.label: 건설 : 거치식 대형쇠뇌 미설치
LanguageData.BuildBalista_Crate.description: Use this to build 구식 거치식 대형쇠뇌 .

LanguageData.BuildCatapult_Crate.label: 건설 : 투석기 미설치
LanguageData.BuildCatapult_Crate.description: Use this to build 투석기 that launches explosive/incendiary shells. Must be manned.
LanguageData.BuildM240B_Crate.label: 건설 : 7.62x51mm M240B MG 미설치
LanguageData.BuildM240B_Crate.description: Use this to build a 7.62x51mm M240B MG, a type of stationary manned 포탑.
LanguageData.BuildMinigunTurret_Crate.label: 건설 : 7.62x51mm M134 미니건 미설치
LanguageData.BuildMinigunTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a 7.62x51mm M134 미니건, a type of stationary manned 포탑. It uses 7.62x51mm ammo.
LanguageData.BuildMGTurret_Crate.label: 건설 : 50BMG M2 Browning MG 미설치
LanguageData.BuildMGTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a 50BMG M2 Browning MG, a type of stationary manned 포탑.
LanguageData.BuildMGTurret_Crate.jobString: 건설 중 : 50BMG M2 Browning MG 미설치.
LanguageData.BuildKPV_Crate.label: 건설 : 14.5mm KPV MG 미설치
LanguageData.BuildKPV_Crate.description: Use this to build a 14.5mm KPV MG, a type of stationary manned 포탑. Requires 14.5mm bullets for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildOerlikonautocannon_Crate.label: 건설 : 20x102mm Oerlikon 자동포탑 미설치
LanguageData.BuildOerlikonautocannon_Crate.descriptio: Use this to build an Oerlikon 자동포탑, a type of stationary manned 포탑. It uses 20x102mm for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildVulcanCannon_Crate.label: 건설 : 20mm Vulcan Cannon 미설치
LanguageData.BuildVulcanCannon_Crate.description: Use this to build a 20mm Vulcan Cannon, a type of stationary manned 포탑. Requires 800 W to function and it uses 20mmx20 Vulcan Bullets for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildChain_Crate.label: 건설 : 30x165mm GSh-30 cannon 미설치
LanguageData.BuildChain_Crate.description: Use this to build a 30x165mm GSh-30 cannon, a type of stationary manned 포탑. It uses 30x165mm for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildAvenger_Crate.label: 건설 : 30x165mm GAU-8 Avenger 미설치
LanguageData.BuildAvenger_Crate.description: Use this to build a 30x165mm GAU-8 Avenger, a type of stationary manned 포탑. It uses 30x165mm shells for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildAGSturret_Crate.label: 건설 : 30mm AGS-17 미설치
LanguageData.BuildAGSturret_Crate.description: Use this to build a AGS-17, a type of stationary manned 포탑. It uses 30mmx6 GL 포탑 수류탄 for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildAGCturret_Crate.label: 건설 : 30mm AGS-30 미설치
LanguageData.BuildAGCturret_Crate.description: Use this to build AGS-30, a type of stationary manned 포탑. It uses 30mmx6 GL 포탑 수류탄 for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildMortar_Crate.label: 건설 : 81mm 박격포 미설치
LanguageData.BuildMortar_Crate.description: Use this to build an 박격포, a type of stationary manned 포탑. It uses 81mm Explosive Mortar Shells for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildFlakTurret_Crate.label: 건설 : 90mm 대공포 포탑 미설치
LanguageData.BuildFlakTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a 90mm 대공포 포탑 a type of stationary manned 포탑. It uses 90mm Cannon Shells for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildCannonTurret_Crate.label: 건설 : 120mm Tank cannon 미설치
LanguageData.BuildCannonTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a 120mm Tank Cannon, a type of stationary manned 포탑. It uses 120mm Cannon Shells for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildHowitzerTurret_Crate.label: 건설 : 155mm 자주포 미설치
LanguageData.BuildHowitzerTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a 155m 자주포, a type of stationary manned 포탑. It uses 155mm Howitzer Shells for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildTOW_Crate.label: 건설 : AT 미사일 BGM-71 TOW 미설치
LanguageData.BuildTOW_Crate.description: Use this to build a Light 미사일 시스템 BGM-71 TOW, a type of stationary manned 포탑. It uses AT 미사일s for ammo.

LanguageData.BuildMediumMissileSystem_Crate.descripti: Use this to build a Medium 미사일 시스템, a type of stationary manned 포탑. It uses 130mmx2 미사일s for ammo.

LanguageData.BuildRocketLauncher_Crate.description: Use this to build a Heavy 미사일 시스템, a type of stationary manned 포탑. It uses 130mmx3 미사일s for ammo.

LanguageData.BuildSentryTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build an Automated Sentry light 포탑, a type of stationary automatic 포탑. It requires power to function.

LanguageData.BuildHeavyTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a Laser 포탑, a type of unmanned automatic 포탑. It requires power to function.
